name: The time keeper (Nyx)
description:
Dash your way through this level in this time-based game! This game was made for the 8 bits to infinity gamejam.

There are some missing models, will have to fix that in the next build.

The next build will be uploaded after voting is finished. This will fix all of the issues found in this version and a linux build.

Controls:

W/A/S/D - Movement

E - DASH ( will be changed to strafing from side-to-side for easier maneuvering)

Assets used:

Dynamic ultra sky ( Might remove in next build)

Blocking starter pack for walls/basic shapes (Xavier Loux)

Various paragon enemies by epic games

Advanced cel shader lite. Modified it to look more monochromatic. Will be further adjusted to look more sharper.

Music by Steven 0 Brian
